snippet: Aimed at millennials, the low-budget franchise films in the deal will head to digital a bit faster than usual.
abstract: AMC Theaters and Cineplex Entertainment will let Paramount Pictures make two horror movies available on digital services only 17 days after they depart most theaters in exchange for cut of studio's digital revenue.
lead_paragraph: Aimed at millennials, the low-budget franchise films in the deal will head to digital a bit faster than usual.

headline.main: Paramount and 2 Theater Chains in Deal to Hurry 2 Films to Digital
headline.print_headline: Paramount and 2 Theater Chains in Deal to Hurry 2 Films to Digital
